Sentencas: An effective fault locating method is necessary to ensure the stable and efficient operation of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Generalized Spatial-Temporal Fault Location Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using LSTM and Causal Inference

Sentencas: There is still a lack of a common fault locating method for locating multiple faults in SOFC systems.
Titulo: Generalized Spatial-Temporal Fault Location Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using LSTM and Causal Inference

Sentencas: Therefore, this article proposes a multifault spatiotemporal locating method combining long short-term memory (LSTM) artificial neural network and causal inference.
Titulo: Generalized Spatial-Temporal Fault Location Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using LSTM and Causal Inference

Sentencas: This method does not rely on the SOFC mechanism model and does not require a large amount of fault data.
Titulo: Generalized Spatial-Temporal Fault Location Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using LSTM and Causal Inference

Sentencas: This method has good migratory characteristics and can be used with different systems.
Titulo: Generalized Spatial-Temporal Fault Location Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using LSTM and Causal Inference

Sentencas: This method first reconstructs the experimental data by LSTM and locates the fault occurrence time according to the reconstruction error.
Titulo: Generalized Spatial-Temporal Fault Location Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using LSTM and Causal Inference

Sentencas: Then, the space where the fault occurred is located by the causal inference method.
Titulo: Generalized Spatial-Temporal Fault Location Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using LSTM and Causal Inference

Sentencas: At the same time, multiple locating methods are compared.
Titulo: Generalized Spatial-Temporal Fault Location Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using LSTM and Causal Inference

Sentencas: Finally, a performance optimization method is adopted from the system level to improve the efficiency of the system.
Titulo: Generalized Spatial-Temporal Fault Location Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using LSTM and Causal Inference

Sentencas: From the comparison results, it can be seen that the scheme proposed in this article is able to locate different faults in time and space with an accuracy of 92.6%.
Titulo: Generalized Spatial-Temporal Fault Location Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using LSTM and Causal Inference

Sentencas: In addition, the system efficiency can be improved by 18.7% after the corresponding optimization methods are adopted.
Titulo: Generalized Spatial-Temporal Fault Location Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using LSTM and Causal Inference
